content: decrease 12sc decrease 2sc decrease 20 r11 20sc 20 after completing r11 do the shift stitch again to make sure the last stitch of r11 will be centered between the 2 legs r12 decrease 2sc decrease 8sc decrease 2sc decrease 16 r13 - 14 2 rounds 16sc 16 stuff the body fasten_off cut the yarn and leave a long tail for sewing pic 5 demiwool 05 ears make 2 using black yarn r1 magic_ring 6sc 6 r2 2sc increase x 2 8 r3 3sc increase x 2 10 r4 4sc increase x 2 12 r5 12sc 12 06 do not stuff the ear fasten_off cut the yarn and leave a long tail for sewing fold the ear in half sew 2 edges together pic 6 demiwool 07 tail using black yarn r1 magic_ring 5sc 5 r2 - 14 13 rounds 5sc 5 do not stuff the tail fasten_off cut the yarn and leave a long 08 tail for sewing pic 7 insert the wire into the tail to make it easier to shape later pic 8 trim the excess wire so its length matches the tail demiwool assembly sew the ears onto both sides of the head between r2 & r7 of the head sew the head to the body sew the tail on the back between r3 & r6 of the body shape the tail into a curve so it can support the cat s body and help it sit steadily use pink yarn to embroider the nose between the 2 eyes and embroider the 2 cheeks right below the 2 eyes gently shape the cat s body with your hands so the bottom is flat allowing it to sit easily now you ve finished jiji the black cat demiwool congratulations your jiji the black cat is all done demiwool
